structure.unit: STRAYS AND ANIMALS RUNNING AT LARGE

law.catch_line: Trespassing on park, camp grounds or floodwalls prohibited.
law.text: No person shall permit any cattle to run or trespass upon any state or national parks, encampment grounds, scout camps, grounds dedicated to religious, educational or recreational purposes or floodwalls erected at public expense.
law.history: Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 229, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1954. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4645n-2.
